events.name: Oregon Ducks at North Carolina Tar Heels

notes.headline: San Diego County Credit Union Holiday Bowl

headlines.description: — The Holiday Bowl emerged from a two-year pandemic hiatus with a new home and the same reputation for thrilling finishes.
headlines.shortLinkText: Nix leads No. 15 Oregon to Holiday Bowl win vs. Tar Heels

events.name: UCF Knights at Duke Blue Devils

headlines.description: — Duke brushed aside UCF with relative ease in the Military Bowl, capping an impressive turnaround this season.
headlines.shortLinkText: Duke contains Plumlee, beats UCF 30-13 in Military Bowl

video.headline: Duke's Riley Leonard dives for the TD

tracking.trackingName: NCF_One-Play (Duke's Riley Leonard dives for the TD) 2022/12/28 ESHEET

events.name: Texas Tech Red Raiders at Ole Miss Rebels

headlines.description: — Tyler Shough threw for 242 yards and a touchdown and ran for two more scores as Texas Tech took advantage of three early turnovers to build a big lead and held on for a 42-25 win over Ole Miss in the Texas Bowl on Wednesday night.
headlines.shortLinkText: Shough leads Texas Tech over Ole Miss 42-25 in Texas Bowl

video.headline: Tyler Shough extends for a Texas Tech TD

tracking.trackingName: NCF_One-Play (Tyler Shough extends for a Texas Tech TD) 2022/12/28 ESHEET
